title: 12g Terske Frame Boss Pump Mounts offer ultra-light way to carry cylindrical objects
content:
Have some unused frame bosses on your bike? Want to carry a pump or other cylindrical objects (less than 400g) without adding a bulky, heavy carrier? If that’s the case, you’ll probably want to check out the new Frame Boss Pump Mounts from Terske.   A product from the clever minds at Lindarets, the Frame […]

The post 12g Terske Frame Boss Pump Mounts offer ultra-light way to carry cylindrical objects appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
